com.cloudofficeprint.Output

Class Globalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudofficeprint.Output.Globalization

  • public class Globalization
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for optional globalization options. Used in PrintJob.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates an instance of Globalization with all variables equal to null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Globalization

        public Globalization()
        Creates an instance of Globalization with all variables equal to null.

      • Globalization

        public Globalization(java.lang.String dateFormat,
                     java.lang.String dateTimeFormat,
                     java.lang.String timestampFormat,
                     java.lang.String timestampTzFormat,
                     java.lang.String nlsSort,
                     java.lang.String nlsComp,
                     java.lang.String nlsNumericCharactersDecGrp,
                     java.lang.String nlsCurrency,
                     java.lang.String nlsTerritory,
                     java.lang.String nlsLanguage,
                     java.lang.String direction,
                     java.lang.String appPrimaryLanguage)
        Parameters:
        dateFormat - the date format. Default used by COP is "DD-MON-YYYY".
        dateTimeFormat - the date time format. Default used by COP is "DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI".
        timestampFormat - the timestamp format. Default used by COP is "DD-MON-YYYY".
        timestampTzFormat - the timestamp tz format. Default used by COP is "DD-MON-YYYY".
        nlsSort - the native language support sort. Default used by COP is "BINARY".
        nlsComp - the native language support. Default used by COP is "BINARY".
        nlsNumericCharactersDecGrp - the native language support. Default used by COP is ".,".
        nlsCurrency - the native language support. Default used by COP is "$".
        nlsTerritory - the native language support. Default used by COP is "AMERICA".
        nlsLanguage - the native language support language. Default used by COP is "AMERICAN".
        direction - the reading direction. Default used by COP is "ltr".
        appPrimaryLanguage - the application primary language. Default used by COP is "en".
